channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Dr. Safety for Android (Consumer)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Dr. Safety for Android (Consumer)

item.title: CVE-2018-18330|2024-08-05T11:08:21.409Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20dr.%20safety%20for%20android%20%28consumer%29
item.description: An Address Bar Spoofing vulnerability in Trend Micro Dr. Safety for Android (Consumer) versions 3.0.1324 and below could allow an attacker to potentially trick a victim into visiting a malicious URL using address bar spoofing on the Private Browser of the app on vulnerable installations.

item.title: CVE-2018-18334|2024-08-05T11:08:21.413Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20dr.%20safety%20for%20android%20%28consumer%29
item.description: A vulnerability in the Private Browser of Trend Micro Dr. Safety for Android (Consumer) versions below 3.0.1478 could allow an remote attacker to bypass the Same Origin Policy (SOP) and obtain sensitive information via crafted JavaScript code on vulnerable installations.
